description.@en: I am a people person; I know how to talk with them and how to ease their tensions.

system.notes: Every Profession possesses a unique knack, an ability that no other Profession has access to. The Trait immediately follows the Profession’s description.

effect.@en: You ignore Peril Condition penalties associated with Skill Tests to heal people. In addition, your medicinal practices never result in a patient suffering from Sepsis. Finally, add an Assist Die when using any Healing Practice (as indicated in Article 8: Healing, Hazards & Horror).
